SELECT /* DETAILSMAPPER.STOCKDETAILSLIST */ A.NO, A.STOCK_NAME, A.STOCK_QUANTITY, A.DIVIDEND_CYCLE, A.PURCHASE_PRICE, NVL(B.DIVIDEND, A.DIVIDEND_AMOUNT) AS DIVIDEND_AMOUNT, A.CLSCD, A.RGSTDATE FROM STOCKPORTFOLIO A , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY STOCK_NAME ORDER BY TRNSCDATE DESC) AS RNK, STOCK_NAME, AMOUNT, DIVIDEND FROM TRANSACTION ) W WHERE RNK = 1 ) B WHERE A.CLSCD != 'N' AND A.STOCK_NAME = B.STOCK_NAME(+)
AND A.STOCK_NAME = #{stockName}
AND (A.DIVIDEND_CYCLE like #{dividendCycle} || '%' OR A.DIVIDEND_CYCLE = '월' )
order by A.DIVIDEND_CYCLE
SELECT /* DetailsMapper.selectBox */ NO, STOCK_NAME, STOCK_QUANTITY, DIVIDEND_CYCLE, PURCHASE_PRICE, DIVIDEND_AMOUNT, CLSCD, RGSTDATE FROM STOCKPORTFOLIO where 1=1 order by STOCK_NAME desc
mapper.update: UPDATE /* DetailsMapper.detailsUpdate */ STOCKPORTFOLIO SET STOCK_NAME= #{stockName}, STOCK_QUANTITY=#{stockQuantity}, DIVIDEND_CYCLE=#{dividendCycle} , PURCHASE_PRICE=#{purchasePrice}, DIVIDEND_AMOUNT=#{dividendAmount}, CLSCD= #{clscd} , RGSTDATE=sysdate WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE /* DetailsMapper.detailsDelete */ STOCKPORTFOLIO SET CLSCD= 'N' , RGSTDATE=sysdate WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT /* DetailsMapper.stockDetailList : 주식 상세 조회 */ A.STOCK_NAME , --주식명 A.STOCK_QUANTITY, --주식보유수 A.PURCHASE_PRICE, --매입금 A.STOCK_QUANTITY * A.PURCHASE_PRICE AS PURCHASE_PRICE_SUM, --매입금(합계) SUM(NVL(B.AMOUNT, 0)) AS AMOUNT --배당금(누적) FROM STOCKPORTFOLIO A , TRANSACTION B WHERE A.STOCK_NAME = B.STOCK_NAME(+) AND A.STOCK_QUANTITY > 0 AND A.STOCK_NAME <> '테스트' AND A.STOCK_NAME = #{STOCK_NAME} GROUP BY A.STOCK_NAME , A.STOCK_QUANTITY, A.PURCHASE_PRICE ORDER BY A.STOCK_NAME

SELECT /* DetailsMapper.selectSum01 : 자산관리 총 자산, 누적 배당금 */ ( SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM(STOCK_QUANTITY * PURCHASE_PRICE), 'FM999,999,999,999.999') FROM STOCKPORTFOLIO WHERE CLSCD = 'Y') AS SUM01 ,( SELECT TO_CHAR(sum(AMOUNT), 'FM999,999,999,999.999') FROM TRANSACTION) AS SUM02 FROM dual

SELECT /* DetailsMapper.selectSum01 : 자산관리 총 자산, 누적 배당금 */ TB01.STOCK_NAME, TO_CHAR(SUM(TB01.AMOUNT), 'FM999,999,999,999.999')+0 AS EACH_MONEY FROM TRANSACTION TB01, STOCKPORTFOLIO TB02 WHERE TB01.STOCK_NAME = TB02.STOCK_NAME AND TB02.CLSCD = 'Y' GROUP BY TB01.STOCK_NAME ORDER BY 1,2 DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(TB01.TRNSCDATE , 'YYYY-MM') AS TRNSC_DATE ,TO_CHAR(SUM(TB01.AMOUNT), 'FM999,999,999,999.999')+0 AS EACH_MONEY01 FROM TRANSACTION TB01, STOCKPORTFOLIO TB02 WHERE TB01.STOCK_NAME = TB02.STOCK_NAME AND TB02.CLSCD = 'Y' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TB01.TRNSCDATE , 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY 1
